scripts.start: npm run start:backend & npm run start:frontend
scripts.stop: npm run stop:backend && npm run stop:frontend
scripts.stop:backend: lsof -ti:5001 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || echo 'Backend not running'
scripts.stop:frontend: lsof -ti:3000 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || echo 'Frontend not running (tried port 3000)'
scripts.install:all: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
